name: CREATION - Foundation Inspired NFT Marketplace
description:
Hey guys,

Today, I built an NFT Market idea that was heavily influenced by "Foundation." I tried to push the boundaries of the figma prototype by making some small animations and effects.


All Components Included!


I'd be delighted to hear your opinions and suggestions! 👍🏻


I'm willing to work with you and consider your suggestions. 🚀


DM me or get in touch via Orpheus@Skiff.com


Follow me on:

Instagram | Dribbble | Twitter


Take care ❤️
